last_episode_to_air.name: Hometown of the Dead III
last_episode_to_air.overview: Faced with an impossible choice, Akira's time may have finally run out. And he hasn't even finished his bucket list yet!

name: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
original_name: ゾン100～ゾンビになるまでにしたい100のこと～
overview: An overworked 24-year-old finally decides to live a little and create a bucket list, when a zombie outbreak hits the country.

episodes.name: Akira of the Dead
episodes.overview: Akira Tendo is an overworked and broken man. But one day, a sudden zombie pandemic flips his world upside down, resulting in a life-changing revelation.

episodes.name: Bucket List of the Dead
episodes.overview: Determined to make up for all his lost vacation days, Akira goes into super lazy mode — until he has to brave the zombified streets to get more beer.

episodes.name: Best Friend of the Dead
episodes.overview: After finding out that his old rugby buddy from college is in danger, Akira rushes over to Shinjuku to try and save him.

episodes.name: Flight Attendant of the Dead
episodes.overview: Akira and Kencho flee into the basement of a department store and meet a trio of flight attendants — checking one more item off the bucket list.

episodes.name: Hero of the Dead
episodes.overview: Remembering his childhood dream, Akira goes into the aquarium to grab a certain item, only to run into a group of survivors running for their lives.

episodes.name: RV of the Dead
episodes.overview: Akira leaves Tokyo behind and heads back to his hometown, Gunma. When he makes a pit stop to get an RV, he reunites with Shizuka.

episodes.name: Truck Stop of the Dead
episodes.overview: Akira finds himself sucked right back into his old, corporate drone mindset. Seeing him in that state triggers bad memories for Shizuka.

episodes.name: Sushi & Hot Springs of the Dead
episodes.overview: Akira and his friends meet a German college student who isn't going to let a zombie outbreak stop her from chasing her dreams.

episodes.name: Treehouse of the Dead
episodes.overview: Forced to take a detour through the forest, Akira gets very excited when he comes across a man building himself a treehouse.

episodes.name: Hometown of the Dead I
episodes.overview: Akira and the others settle in, helping out the villagers and their fellow refugees from Tokyo. But an old friend becomes consumed with revenge.

episodes.name: Hometown of the Dead II
episodes.overview: With a massive zombie horde coming their way, Akira and the others split up to try and save the villagers, only to find themselves facing another threat.

episodes.name: Hometown of the Dead III
episodes.overview: Faced with an impossible choice, Akira's time may have finally run out. And he hasn't even finished his bucket list yet!
